about.short:
My name is Balina Bálint. A real enthusiast developer, biker, beerpong lover, and engaged to a beautiful lady.
With only 3 years of experience behind me I work with multiple remarkable partners. I am leader a small team, and each month I deliver the best quality of product.

timeline.title: BA in Computer Science

timeline.title: Backend Developer

timeline.title: Mobile Developer

timeline.title: Fullstack Developer

timeline.title: IoT Developer
